languages.text: Неснижаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и включает следующие типы: -Варп: любой вид воздействия энергий варпа. -Психический: все, что повреждает нервную систему органических целей. Неорганические цели, такие как машины и физические {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, невосприимчивы к этому типу урона. -Машинный: все, что влияет исключительно на машины и технологии. Органические цели и немеханические физические объекты невосприимчивы к этому типу урона.

Irreducible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>
languages.original_text: Неснижаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и включает следующие типы: -Варп: любой вид воздействия энергий варпа. -Психический: все, что повреждает нервную систему органических целей. Неорганические цели, такие как машины и физические {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, невосприимчивы к этому типу урона. -Машинный: все, что влияет исключительно на машины и технологии. Органические цели и немеханические физические объекты невосприимчивы к этому типу урона.

languages.text:
Unreduzierbarer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>Warp: Jede Art von Einwirkung auf die Energien des Warps.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: Alles, was das Nervensystem organischer Ziele schädigt. Nicht-organische Ziele wie Maschinen und physische {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} sind dagegen immun.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Maschine: Alles, was ausschließlich Maschinen und Technologie betrifft. Organische Ziele und nicht-mechanische physische Objekte sind dagegen immun.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Unreduzierbarer Schaden ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>Warp: Jede Art von Einwirkung auf die Energien des Warps</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: Alles, was das Nervensystem von organischen Zielen schädigt. Nicht-organische Ziele wie Maschinen und physische {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} sind dagegen immun</indent>
-<indent=5%>Maschine: Alles, was ausschließlich Maschinen und Technologie betrifft. Organische Ziele und nicht-mechanische physische Objekte sind dagegen immun</indent>

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} non réductibles ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. Il en existe différents types :
-<indent=5%>Dégâts du Warp : toute forme d'exposition aux énergies du Warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts mentaux : tout ce qui endommage le système nerveux des cibles organiques. Les cibles non organiques comme les machines et les {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvertures{/g} physiques y sont insensibles.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts mécaniques : tout ce qui affecte exclusivement les machines et la technologie. Les cibles organiques et les objets physiques non mécaniques y sont insensibles.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Irreducible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les dégâts non réductibles ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g}. Leurs différents types sont les suivants :
-<indent=5%>Dégâts warp : toute forme d'exposition aux énergies du Warp</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts mentaux : tout ce qui endommage le système nerveux des cibles organiques. Les cibles non organiques comme les machines et les {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvertures{/g} physiques sont invulnérables à ceux-ci</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dégâts mécaniques : tout ce qui affecte exclusivement les machines et la technologie. Les cibles organiques et les objets physiques non mécaniques sont invulnérables à ceux-ci</indent>

languages.text:
透射{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}可以穿透目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。透射伤害类型包括：
- <indent=5%>亚空间：以任何形式暴露在亚空间之下遭受的伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>精神：针对有机目标神经系统的伤害。非有机目标（如机械）与物理{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}对此类伤害免疫。</indent>
- <indent=5%>机械：只会影响机械与科技造物的伤害类型。有机目标与非机械对象对此类伤害免疫。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Irreducible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
透射伤害可以穿透目标{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}。透射伤害类型包括：
- <indent=5%>亚空间：以任何形式暴露在亚空间之下遭受的伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>精神：针对有机目标神经系统的伤害。非有机目标（如机械）与物理{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}对此类伤害免疫。</indent>
- <indent=5%>机械：只会影响机械与科技造物的伤害类型。有机目标与非机械对象对此类伤害免疫。</indent>

languages.original_text: Irreducible damage ignores Armour. Its types are: -{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g}: any kind of exposure to the energies of the Warp. -{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mental{/g}: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical cover are immune to it. -{g|Encyclopedia:MachineDamage}Machine{/g}: anything that affects exclusively machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} irreducible ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Tiene los siguientes tipos:
-<indent=5%>Disformidad: todo tipo de exposición a las energías de la disformidad.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: todo lo que dañe el sistema nervioso de los objetivos orgánicos. Los objetivos no orgánicos, como las máquinas y la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} física, son inmunes.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Máquina: todo lo que afecte exclusivamente a las máquinas y la tecnología. Los objetivos orgánicos y los objetos físicos no mecánicos son inmunes.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Irreducible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>

El daño irreducible ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}. Tiene los siguientes tipos:
-<indent=5%>Disformidad: todo tipo de exposición a las energías de la disformidad.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: todo lo que dañe el sistema nervioso de los objetivos orgánicos. Los objetivos no orgánicos, como las máquinas y la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} física, son inmunes.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Máquina: todo lo que afecte exclusivamente a las máquinas y la tecnología. Los objetivos orgánicos y los objetos físicos no mecánicos son inmunes.</indent>

languages.text:
既約の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視する。その種類は：
－<indent=5%>ワープ：ワープのエネルギーへのあらゆる種類のさらし。</indent>
－<indent=5%>精神：有機性ターゲットの神経系へダメージを与えるもの。機械や物理的な{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}のような非有機性ターゲットには無効である。</indent>
－<indent=5%>機械：機械および技術にのみ影響を及ぼすもの。有機性ターゲットや 非機械的な物理的物体には無効である。</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>

－<indent=5%>精神：有機性ターゲットの神経系へダメージを与えるもの。機械や物理的な{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}のような非有機性ターゲットには無効である</indent>

languages.text:
Azaltılamaz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} yok sayar. Türleri şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>Öteboyut: Öteboyut enerjilerine maruz kalındığında alınan hasar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Zihinsel: Organik hedeflerin sinir sistemine zarar veren her şeyden alınan hasar. Makineler gibi inorganik hedefler ve fiziksel {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperler{/g} bu hasar türüne karşı bağışıktır.
-<indent=5%>Makine: Özellikle makine ve teknolojik aletleri etkileyen her şeyden alınan hasar. Organik hedefler ve mekanik olmayan fiziksel nesneler bu hasar türüne karşı bağışıktır.</indent>

Irreducible {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>Warp: any kind of exposure to the energies of the warp.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mental: anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Machine: anything that exclusively affects machines and technology. Organic targets and non-mechanical physical objects are immune to it.</indent>
